mapper.select: /*리뷰 목록 조회*/ SELECT r.review_code ,r.reveiw_num ,l.laundry_name ,r.m_id ,r.review_content ,r.counting_star ,r.regist_time FROM tb_review AS r INNER join tb_laundry AS l on r.laundry_code = l.laundry_code order by r.reveiw_num desc;
